org.datavec.api.transform.condition.column

Class IntegerColumnCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.transform.condition.column.BaseColumnCondition
      • org.datavec.api.transform.condition.column.IntegerColumnCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Condition

    public class IntegerColumnCondition
extends BaseColumnCondition
    Condition that applies to the values in an Integer column, using a ConditionOp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
